title: Consistent crazy ping
body:
Hey guys,

My ping constantly bounces from 50ms - 300ms which means I can't really play LoL.
When I ping a site from the command line my ping changes massively each second :/ 

I tried a wired connection but it didn't help.
Same on multiple devices.

Any idea how I can fix this?

Thanks

replies.body: Having a wired connection is good, but you can run into other barriers and degradation that can reduce your ping to the game server.  Go over each step of the [connection issues](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) guide to troubleshoot this towards a fix.  Let me know if you run into any issues, but be sure to test it in a custom game.
